ch.iserver.ace.net.core
Class PortableDocumentImpl

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.net.core.PortableDocumentImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PortableDocumentExt, PortableDocument
public class PortableDocumentImpl
extends Object
implements PortableDocumentExt

Default implementation of interface PortableDocument for the network layer. This object contains the actual data of the document.
